comments:
The error you are getting is:

0x80004002  -2147467262  No such interface supported

"AcroPDF.PDF.1" does not support the neccessary interfaces to be created with 
OleCreate.  That is not something that SWT can change.

You can, however, use the following program ID instead:

String progID = "AcroExch.Document.7"

traces.message: Failed to create Ole Client. result = -2147467262
